root.name: Harvest Moon: Tree of Tranquility
root.description: OverviewHarvest Moon: Tree of Tranquility is another instalment in the Harvest Moon series of farming simulation games that was developed by Marvelous Interactive. It is the first Harvest Moon title to be developed exclusively for the Nintendo Wii console.Interestingly, Tree of Tranquility was originally listed as "Harvest Moon: Heroes" on many sites due to the listing "Harvest Moon / Heroes" that was featured on on the E3 press booklet. However this was just short for Harvest Moon: Tree of Tranquility and No More Heroes, two games that were displayed at the same time.StoryYou are headed for a small island with big dreams. When a storm hits the boat carrying you to your destination, trouble starts and you pass out. When you wake up, you find yourself in a doctor's office. However, while you were out you had a strange dream. As you ponder over the strange dream, the mayor shows up and introductions begin. A new adventure awaits!
